Package agilermi.utility.bytestream

Provides classes and interfaces used to access byte streams through RMI.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RemoteInput  
    RemoteOutput  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RemoteInputToStream  
    RemoteOutputToStream  
    StreamToRemoteInput  
    StreamToRemoteOutput  

Package agilermi.utility.bytestream Description

Provides classes and interfaces used to access byte streams through RMI. For example, a FileOutputStream can be exposed as a remote object.

To expose an OutputStream instance on RMI, transforming it to a remote object do the following:
  1. build a new StreamToRemoteOutput instance passing the OutputStream to its constructor;
  2. publish or share the pointer to the StreamToRemoteOutput;
  3. On the remote side, yoou can transform the RemoteOutput instance to an OutputStream building a RemoteOutputToStream.
  4. Now you can use the remote reference to your OutputStream as any other stream (e.g. decorating it with BufferedOutputStream and similar decorators).

You should follow this same way for InputStreams, by using StreamToRemoteInput and RemoteInputToStream classes.
